text:
Full Stack Developer | Dublin, Ireland | Onsite | Experienced/Senior and VISA BlueBridge Technologies is a digital medical device company. We develop regulated systems & software for the Pharma and Medical Device sectors.

This is a greenfield role, and you would have a large amount of freedom in the technologies and architecture of the applications and systems you would be building.

Please email cv to MikeMoran@bluebridgetech.com
